text: Eteke tomaloke tara ocarata yoraa arau koraa, â€˜ami duyo tomara pratipalakara raachula, seye amara lagata bani icharaa'ilaka yabalai diya arau sihamtaka kasta nidiba, ami tomara ocarata tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa nidarsana lai ahicho; arau yisakale satpatha anusarana karae te'omlokara prati santi barsita ha'omka
